Subject: Invitation to Discuss Quantum Computing on TechTalk Daily

Hi Dr. Mitchell,

I’m Jordan Lee, host of the TechTalk Daily podcast. I’ve been following your work, especially your book “Quantum for Everyone,” and I’m impressed by how clearly you make complex quantum concepts accessible to a broad audience.

We’re planning an upcoming episode titled “Quantum Computing Made Simple: How Everyday People Can Understand the Future,” and I think your expertise in science communication would be a perfect fit. Our listeners are particularly interested in quantum computing and love content that breaks down the science without the jargon.

Would you be open to joining us for a 30‑minute conversation? We can work around your schedule and handle all the recording logistics.

Looking forward to the possibility of having you on the show!

Best regards,
Jordan Lee
TechTalk Daily
